One of the worst communities online that I've heard about .

BUT ... you can still find good people in it. As a matter of fact, lots of good people.

Until you find them, try muting people who abuse chat. Pay no attention to provocations, and take no personal challenges, just enjoy it.

Despite the community, it's a good game with lots of maps,weapons and game modes to choose.

I personally like deathmatch, just shoot the opposing team and make friends along the way.
